seed_pair.target: Estoy disfrutando descubrir más sobre este lenguaje
seed_pair.known: I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.

seed_pair.target: Estamos intentando decir que no es así
seed_pair.known: We're trying to say that it's not like that.

seed_pair.target: No estamos intentando oír muchas más palabras
seed_pair.known: We're not trying to hear many more words.

seed_pair.target: Necesitamos cambiar lo que estamos haciendo
seed_pair.known: We need to change what we're doing.

seed_pair.target: Por eso no sabía la respuesta
seed_pair.known: That is why he didn't know the answer.

seed_pair.target: No necesitamos sentirnos felices, solo necesitamos trabajar duro
seed_pair.known: We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.

seed_pair.target: Esperábamos ver lo que estabas haciendo
seed_pair.known: We hoped to see what you were doing.

seed_pair.target: No esperábamos despertar en el medio de la noche
seed_pair.known: We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.

seed_pair.target: Debemos trabajar duro para aprender muchas palabras nuevas
seed_pair.known: We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.

seed_pair.target: Somos amigos, y después de que terminemos me gustaría relajarme
seed_pair.known: We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.
